body: And they probably got depressed because of drawings too lol
Look at all these bitches in the comments crying about NTR authors. LOL Did your fragile little hearts got broken by drawings? LMAO What a bunch of wusses.
Would've been perfect if the mc had at least a chance to smash her
better than i expected dialogue along with incest vibe good

Kon-kit always gets me going, especially when is sluts like this blond teacher etc. I really like how the author keeps revisiting his girls and making them bigger characters than just creating new short stories with new girls one after the other. You can just feel more about them like that because they aren't one off.  I wish others did that too.

All you guys say it's practically consensual rape, and I can agree with you guys, but, can we just stay and appreciate the art and the translation, because I for one would like to appreciate both of them.

What's with all the mad? Clara is a huge slut and she's in a lot of other of Kon Kit's storylines being a huge slut there too. The only ones "cheating" in Kon Kit's hentai are the bookstore clerk girl and the superhero wife who are often forced to have sex. Everyone else is just a huge slut.
I think the author deservers a free helicopter ride.
hahaha does this count as NTR I wonder? :thinking:
awesome. Now translate both Yoridori and Yurushite please. I don't know why noone picked them up
That is some mess up shit that the poor guy that did the most work gets nothing!

Knowing this title is for comedy purpose (I get it)... but why in the blue hell is it that the guy who put the most work and got those losers a win doesn't get to f*ck her?!  ≖_≖  If this isn't an injustice, then I don't know what is. *sigh*
